hits.name: Marr Labs
hits.long_description:
Marr Labs is making AI-voice agents that are indistinguishable from humans. We build task-specific agents for roles like scheduling, sales, customer service and more. 

Our first product is the Vox Scheduling Agent targeted at the Home Services Industry where every lost call is a lost revenue opportunity. For contractors, plumbers, electricians, and other service providers, voicemails and phone tag not only frustrate customers but also lead to lost business. 

Han and Dave previously created Vlingo, the speech-to-text tech that powered Siri and created Samsung's Siri competitor, S-Voice. Vlingo was acquired for $225M. Now, LLMs have created an entirely new platform that can take original voice agents like Siri from robotic to human, which will be a game changer. But building human-like agents that are reliable at scale is hard due to both latency and hallucinations–problems we have solved at Marr Labs.

The opportunity for human-like AI-voice agents is tremendous. In the United States alone, missed calls cost businesses over $80B a year. And that’s just the tip of the iceberg as other phone-based roles in sales, customer service and support are many times larger.
hits.one_liner: AI-voice agents that are indistinguishable from humans.

hits.name: Million.js
hits.long_description:
Million.js is an open source tool that makes React.js 70% faster.

We want to make Million a web embed that allows developers to select and ask why parts of a page are slow and automatically generate a GitHub pull request with a fix using AI.

Today, most developers spend weeks trying to comprehend flame graphs and execution traces, debug with frustration, and give up. We realized that web developers don’t want to put the grimy work to make their app performant. Instead, we fix performance issues automatically, with no migration.

Our end goal is to make all applications automatically fast, starting from frontend to backend, and eventually mobile apps & infrastructure.
hits.one_liner: Copilot for optimizing web performance

hits.name: Reprompt
hits.long_description:
Generative AI applications are notoriously hard to scale to production: 90% of all Generative AI pilots never make it to production.

Reprompt makes it easy to track and fix hallucinations and other nasty issues in production, so you can ship with confidence.  Find where your Generative AI application is breaking down and fix it without writing dozens of if statements.

Here’s what you can do with reprompt:
1. Trace your responses to users across chat, RAG and function calling
2. Automatically track and highlight hallucinations and file them as bugs 
3. Write custom prompt overrides to handle the edge cases without changing your main prompt or pushing code

Behind the scenes of every great product (Uber, Doordash, Waymo, Robinhood) there's an ops team with a dashboard full of if statements and data overrides that keeps the whole company from collapsing. From what we’re seeing, AI apps will require similar tuning, and we’re ready to build that toolkit.
hits.one_liner: Reprompt diagnoses and fixes hallucinations without devs writing code

hits.name: Blacksmith
hits.long_description:
Blacksmith helps companies run their continuous integration (CI) up to twice as fast, at half the cost. We do this by running their CI on high performance gaming CPUs.

- Engineering productivity is often marred by slow CI that grows quadratically with the size of the engineering organization.
- On top of this, companies pay high markups to run CI on the hyperscalers.
- Consequently, companies have to run their CI on spot instances to keep costs in check. Since spot instances can get pre-empted at any point, running CI reliably on them requires [significant engineering investment](https://www.rippling.com/blog/how-rippling-used-spot-instances-to-save-and-scale-ci-cd).


Blacksmith offers CI compute that is more performant, cheaper, and reliable. With Blacksmith, companies do not have to think about CI as they scale.

We are starting with GitHub Actions - today's most popular and fastest-growing CI system. With a one-line change, companies can run their CI up to twice as fast on our high-performance hardware. In addition to this, Blacksmith provides colocated warm caches along with optimizations for common CI workloads (like building and pushing Docker images).


Aayush, JP and Aditya have gained deep systems and product knowledge from their time at Cockroach Labs and Faire respectively. Both these companies, with several hundred engineers, were spending in the order of millions of dollars on their CI. Yet they were riddled with slow CI and actively seeking out cheaper and faster alternatives. Blacksmith offers exactly this alternative, at a time where being lean is table-stakes for most companies.
hits.one_liner: Run your CI up to twice as fast, at half the cost

hits.name: renderlet
hits.long_description:
renderlet is a framework that enables developers to write 2D and 3D rendering code once and run it anywhere.

Building graphically intensive applications is very hard – existing tools are cumbersome and aren’t truly platform agnostic, leading to frequent rework. With renderlet, a fully portable rendering pipeline is embedded in your app using WebAssembly, enabling graphics to safely and automatically run on any platform’s GPU.

Never (re)write another line of raw OpenGL code again.
hits.one_liner: Build cross-platform interactive graphics and visualizations

hits.name: Powder
hits.long_description:
Powder is building a generative-AI co-analyst to help wealth advisors win new clients by automating the sales process.  Wealth Advisors have an arduous sales process that has little transparency and leaves prospective clients unclear of the value they provide.  Advisors relying on their current manual operations are facing a tremendous challenge to scale.

Powder is for wealth advisors who are frustrated with burning costly analyst time making sense of prospects’ portfolio data, dealing with very long sales timelines to win over prospects, struggling to create beautiful presentations that highlight their value to prospects and looking to leverage the latest technology to future proof their firm.

Powder helps wealth advisors -

-By leveraging Powder’s generative-AI document and conversation extractor to rapidly leverage the prospect’s portfolio.

-By fine tuning analytics that automatically demonstrate better investment returns, reduced portfolio risk, reduced tax consequence and lowered investment fees.

-Creating beautiful presentations that succinctly outline the benefits to the prospective clients.

SooYung and Kanishk encountered this problem repeatedly while they were building their prior company RCI Navigator (acquired by Addepar).  Growth is just as important as retention, but there isn't a purpose built platform for growth.  Additionally, as we started to build, we realized that generative AI can solve many of the manual tasks that have been haunting the advisors for decades.  Advisors are itching to adopt AI to future proof themselves.

We are currently signing on firms on yearly contracts.  The list is growing quickly to 10+ with severals more firms on the cusp of adopting Powder.

hits.name: GoldenBasis
hits.long_description:
GoldenBasis makes it easy for brokerages (think Schwab or Fidelity) to run their back office with modern software, and we’re starting with investment account transfers. For example, when you want to transfer your stocks from Fidelity to Schwab, GoldenBasis would let Schwab gather your transfer information, track the status of your transfer, and automatically update their internal records.

The current account transfer process is built on top of 40-year-old software and requires multiple rounds of manual data entry. This error-prone process causes frustration for brokerage operations and often delays account transfers for weeks, which leads to unhappy customers. GoldenBasis automates the entire account transfer lifecycle, eliminating hours of repetitive work and reducing transfer times from weeks to days.
hits.one_liner: Modern back-office software for brokerages

hits.name: Arcane
hits.long_description:
At Arcane, we're building a AI-powered platform for storytelling and role-playing games. You create a rich world world of characters, locations, storylines and items, and then play games in that world. 

Our first product is Summon Worlds, available at https://www.summonworlds.com. In Summon Worlds, you can create Summons, with backstories, images, stats and more. People have summoned millions of creations so far, and used them in multiplayer campaigns and AI-powered chats. 

We use generative AI all over Summon Worlds: to create summons, help run games, invent stories, and for character chat. We're building an AI that can quickly invent a rich world, and then create storylines, have NPCs with rich dialogue and backstories, and create games that are immersive and fun to play. 

Rohan and Lucas were both software engineers at Meta. While at Meta, we worked together on AR Glasses and Gen AI. We love building consumer products, and are excited to help bring the power of modern AI to everyone.
hits.one_liner: Platform for creating and playing AI-powered games

hits.name: Lumona
hits.long_description:
Lumona is a product search engine that brings you high-quality recommendations from the creators you trust. Instead of you wading through pages of clickbait Google results or adding "reddit” to your search, we serve you the products you would otherwise spend hours researching for. 

As the internet and search have evolved, it has become increasingly obvious that searching the whole internet is now a bug, not a feature. In today’s era of constant information overload, finding the best products to meet your needs amid a sea of SEO-spam and sneaky advertising has never been harder. Imagine trying to find an effective skincare routine, currently you have to comb through countless YouTube videos and Reddit threads to understand the steps of what an ideal routine looks like for you before even deciding which products you want. Lumona simplifies those steps into one search, showing the best products for you, as recommended by the content creators you watch and the communities you visit every day, in one place. 

We have been working together since meeting during our sophomore year at MIT, recently winning first place at the HackMIT hackathon this past September. As part of MIT’s student-run Web Lab class, we taught over 300 students modern web development. Growing up in the age of social media, we’ve always been influenced by content creators in the products we buy, and have spent endless hours learning how to research and shop for the products we need amid an internet drowning in noise. We are committed to fixing product search—so that you never have to add “reddit” to the end of your searches ever again.
hits.one_liner: Product search featuring recommendations from creators you trust.

hits.name: Marblism
hits.long_description:
Everyone dreads the first few lines of code: choosing frameworks, designing UI/UX, setting up your project, integrating front-end with back-end…

That's why we created Marblism: just describe your app, and voila! 

Here’s how the magic work:

1. Describe the product you want to build: it works well for SaaS, marketplaces, social apps and AI apps
2. We generate the database and the back-end
3. We generate the front-end
4. You clone the github repos and you’re ready to go

The 90% heavy lifting work is done for you. You focus on adding your 10% unique touch.

You can launch your idea in days not months.

hits.name: Onedoc
hits.long_description:
Onedoc is an API for generating custom PDF Documents. Businesses generate more than 1.2 billion PDFs every day.  We make it easy to create these documents with the modern tools they use for web development.


PDFs remain a cornerstone of modern business, yet nothing has significantly changed in decades. People are still generating ugly, static documents using outdated libraries and software.

At Onedoc, we aim to revolutionize the way your company utilizes PDFs. By offering a straightforward API and a comprehensive web platform, you will be able to:

1. Create PDFs using the latest web technologies, which developers know and love.
2. Generate dynamic content on the fly, including database information, AI-enhanced copy, A/B testing, and complex signature workflows.
3. Host your documents and share them directly with your colleagues and customers securely.
4. Track usage for each of your documents, identifying "who did what, and when?"

Tired of your current document management system? Try Onedoc today and enhance your brand and customer experience.
hits.one_liner: Dead simple PDF generation for developers.

hits.name: Retell AI
hits.long_description:
We help developers implement human-like voice agents in a day instead of months. Plug in your LLM, a voice agent is born!

From AI-powered call agents to voice-enabled coaching apps and lifelike companions, we are your trusted ally in turning these visions into reality.

Although Voice AI has been around for some time, it hasn't yet become effective enough for mainstream use, primarily because of poor user experience. Conversational flows often feel awkward with unnatural pauses and interruptions, requests are frequently misunderstood, and voices sound robotic or overly dramatic. On top of that, setting up such a Voice AI system can require upwards of 100 hours of frustrating development.

By offering a truly conversational, fast, and empathetic Voice AI that can be easily configured for any industry and integrated into any product, we aim to push the boundary of user-friendliness to a new level, reaching the threshold for mainstream adoption of Voice AI.

We are at a pivotal moment in history where Voice AI will become the primary interface for accessing products and services, revolutionizing our interactions with machines for the better.

Retell AI is at the forefront of creating this new reality.
hits.one_liner: Infra for Building Conversational Voice AI

Spark is an AI-powered planning and workflow tool for large-scale clean energy developers that lets them break ground faster. With Spark, developers can search across thousands of PDFs, maps, and websites to identify requirements and screen locations in seconds, not weeks.

Julia and Tae were previously engineering and product managers at Brex, Tesla, and Apple. They grew up within 10 minutes of each other in Brazil but met in the US through a shared passion for software and infrastructure for society.

Julia was one of the youngest engineering managers at Brex, having joined as an early engineer in 2019. Within months of breaking into the energy industry, she built tools (like SolarGPT used by hundreds of developers) and wrote articles about project finance, tax credits, and use cases for LLMs that went viral with industry leaders. 

Tae was the PM leading the buildout and deployment of Tesla's warehouse system. The systems he worked on managed $xxM in daily inventory and serviced a factory that built 7k cars per week. He was also a founding engineer on Lucid’s commerce team, building Lucid's payment platform from scratch — which pioneered online vehicle sales for the $7B company by processing millions of dollars in vehicle sales per month.
hits.one_liner: AI-powered workflows for large-scale clean energy

hits.name: Terrakotta
hits.long_description:
Terrakotta is a web-phone that lets users speak with leads and leave AI generated voicemails. Our first customers are commercial real estate brokers who use Terrakotta to clone their voices and keep twice as many clients engaged with personalized, automated voicemails about specific listings.

In early user interviews, we met a commercial real estate broker who called the same contact and left a voicemail every other week for 2 years with no response. After 2 years, the contact finally answered and listed their property with the broker because of the persistence and knowledge they showed through their voicemails. These voicemails earned the broker $50,000 in commission. We’re convinced that voicemail has always been a powerful channel, but previously it was hard to track and scale. Now with AI speech-to-speech tech, that’s not the case.

We started working on this product in late January 2024 and are already negotiating paid pilots at 5 of the top 10 commercial real estate brokerages in the US.

Vincent was an incoming Software Engineer at Palantir before dropping out of college to found Terrakotta. After graduating from Wharton, Kus was a Senior Analyst at McKinsey & Company where he wrote custom data solutions for large tech companies and advised principal investors and GTM execs on strategy. Gabe graduated from Georgia Tech before architecting core backend services for Lyft Business and Human Interest. We’ve used our experience tackling software development and consulting in different contexts to take commercial real estate head on and prove the ability of voice nurture as a growth channel.
hits.one_liner: AI web phone designed for cold outreach

hits.name: Stacksync
hits.long_description:
Stacksync powers real-time and bidirectional data synchronization between CRMs (e.g. Salesforce, Hubspot or SAP) and databases (e.g. Postgres, Google BigQuery,...). Edits made in your CRM will instantly update in your Database, and vice-versa. To set up a sync, users simply have to connect the two chosen apps in one click and select the tables they want to sync, no-code!
Stacksync reduces implementation delays from months to minutes for CRM integration projects and removes all the complexity behind CRM new feature development. We show a 90% improvement on delivery time and budget.
hits.one_liner: Real-time and two-way sync between CRMs and Databases

hits.name: Zep AI
hits.long_description:
Zep is the easiest way to add long-term memory to your AI Assistant. With Zep, you can recall, understand, and extract data from chat histories, enabling you to build rich, personalized experiences.

tl;dr
- Zep ensures your AI Assistant remembers relevant facts and nuance from historical conversations, no matter how distant in the past.
- Zep makes dialog useful: Control program flow, extract structured data, select the right prompts or tools, build customer segments, and more.
- Fast! Minimize the number of LLM calls keeping your users waiting. Zep completes tasks in a 1/10 of the time compared to similar functionality built with OpenAI.

See Zep in Action: https://youtu.be/qVspUE_R-iI

380K+ Open Source Installs (and counting)

Zep’s open source project has seen over 380K installs, 18K+ weekly npm + pypi package downloads, and has 1,800 GitHub stars. Zep Open Source is in use at many early stage startups as well as Fortune 500 media and toy companies.

hits.name: Lumina
hits.long_description:
Lumina leverages Deep Retrieval & Agentic AI to augment complex research tasks. Our current focus is discovery, extraction and curation from scientific journal articles. This helps our >8000 users create and interact with multiple knowledge bases for their research queries and writing tasks. Key features include cited answers, robust extraction tables, agentic search, and an interactive reading experience. 

Overtime - we will be augmenting the entire scientific process with AI.  This includes data analysis, experimentation (data generation) and generating complete articles. We aim to create a near AGI experience for researchers to speed up the rate of scientific progress. 

The team consists of 3 life-long friends. We've been roommates, bandmates, lab-partners and now co-founders. Collectively, our experience encompasses hard tech R&D, statistics, AI, and software engineering. These factors gave us a strong foundation for assisting the research community through neural nets.
hits.one_liner: AI Search Engine for Scientific Research

hits.name: Manifold Freight
hits.long_description:
Manifold is revolutionizing spot freight procurement for Carriers, Brokers, and Shippers. Our inaugural product transforms the booking process for spot shipments, significantly reducing empty miles and increasing revenue. By aggregating shipment opportunities from a variety of shipper and brokerage sources, into a single location.

Andrew and Oliver, bring deep domain expertise from their pivotal roles at Convoy, where they led the automation of processes that scaled to handle over 10,000 shipments weekly. This background has been instrumental in shaping Manifold's innovative approach.

hits.name: Tensorfuse
hits.long_description:
Tensorfuse is a testing and evaluation platform for LLM applications. We help developers identify failure points in their LLM pipelines and ways to fix them. 

LLM evaluation has two key aspects: 
1. Offline evaluations - experimenting with different prompts, architectures and models on production datasets. 
2. Online evaluations - live production monitoring to prevent security threats and performance degradation.

Tensorfuse caters to both aspects of evaluations. For offline evaluations, we offer an end-to-end testing platform that supports dataset creation, automated testing and continuous deployment. For online evaluations, we provide in-house preference models as evaluators, which are 100x cost-effective and 10x faster than GPT-3.5/4.

We can handle the entire LLM app lifecycle, from experimenting with your initial prompt to deploying your foundational model. Our goal is to bring predictability to every company's LLM  app development cycle.
hits.one_liner: Evaluate LLM apps with preference-based AI models

hits.name: Preloop
hits.long_description:
Preloop automatically translates training scripts into deployed ML models served on endpoints in hours rather than weeks. This allows science teams to focus more on developing models and less on deploying them.

We provide features such as observability, versioning, and flexible deployment options. Model retraining is simplified through scheduled runs and automatic metric checks, making sure that only the best models are deployed into production. It is compatible with all major ML packages, and can be customized to the specific needs of a team. 

Models you train with Preloop can be deployed to our cloud, or your own. Teams with high security requirements can also deploy the entire Preloop stack to their own cloud as an on-prem deployment. We're building what Tejas wished he had as a data scientist at Amazon.

Superagent makes it easy for anyone to use AI to do complex tasks. Enterprises and startups already use it for things like managing R&D projects, customer support, and market research. It's open-source, and it's designed for everyone - not just AI experts. 

How companies can build their own AI-agents to perform whatever workflow:
- No coding or infrastructure needed: Configure AI-agents using simple markup.
- Integration with Airtable: Ideal for managing data-heavy tasks like market research.
- API and SDKs: Allows embedding AI-agents into any app or third-party system, including task management tools like Jira.

By choosing Superagent, companies can:
- Automate complex tasks that would typically require manual effort or sophisticated programming.
- Reduce operational costs by spending less time and fewer resources on routine tasks.
- Gain a competitive edge by doing better work internally, but also by creating new customer experiences.

hits.name: Ellipsis
hits.long_description:
Ellipsis is an AI devtool that converts technical instructions into working, tested code. Customers like PromptLayer and Warp use us to review changes and fix bugs.

Working with Ellipsis is like working with a virtual colleague; first, a developer tags Ellipsis on GitHub or sends it a Slack message. Then Ellipsis explores the codebase, makes the required changes, and creates a pull request with the implementation.

Ellipsis runs in the cloud so developers can make progress on other tasks while Ellipsis writes or reviews code on their behalf. The product integrates with GitHub, Slack, and Linear, allowing for code generations that consider the product roadmap.

The team launched automatic code review in late December. Since then, the customer base has doubled every two weeks.

hits.name: Pythagora (GPT Pilot)
hits.long_description:
Pythagora is an open source tool that builds apps from scratch by talking to users. It uses LLMs to automate developer workflows (debugging, refactoring, etc.) and ask user questions whenever it needs feedback.

It is an IDE extension built on top of our open-source tool, GPT Pilot, which has over 22k Github stars.

You start by describing an app you want to build; then, it asks you questions about the details of the app to write the full app specifications. Once the specs are done, it starts coding. When it finishes a task, it asks you to test the app and tell it if something is incorrect. It iterates with you by changing the code and asking you for feedback until the task is finished. Finally, it commits the code it has written and proceeds to the next task until the entire app is finished.

hits.name: OpenCopilot
hits.long_description:
OpenCopilot is an open-source tool that lets any product easily add AI assistants capable of guiding and helping users with simple English commands. For example, a music app can now understand and execute "play my favorite playlist" without any complex coding.


⭐ It will give your product's users a new text/voice-based interface that is much easier to interact with, the copilot will have access to your product's APIs, so it can call them and retrieve/add data to and from them.

⭐ ➡️ For example, If Jira used OpenCopilot, Jira users could ask things like "Please create a new board, and then add new tickets about our payments migration project then assign X on it". So no more clicks on the UI, they can describe whatever they want to do via text. 

⭐ ➡️ Most of your flows will be automatically handled (you do not need to configure it), or you can define them manually via our flows editor.

We are 100% open source with more than 2500 stars on GitHub!
hits.one_liner: Helping businesses embed an AI assistant inside their product

OpenCopilot is an open-source tool that lets any product easily add AI assistants capable of guiding and helping users with simple English commands. For example, a music app can now understand and execute "play my favorite playlist" without any complex coding.


⭐ It will give your product's users a new text/voice-based interface that is much easier to interact with, the copilot will have access to your product's APIs, so it can call them and retrieve/add data to and from them.

⭐ ➡️ For example, If Jira used OpenCopilot, Jira users could ask things like "Please create a new board, and then add new tickets about our payments migration project then assign X on it". So no more clicks on the UI, they can describe whatever they want to do via text. 

⭐ ➡️ Most of your flows will be automatically handled (you do not need to configure it), or you can define them manually via our flows editor.

We are 100% open source with more than 2500 stars on GitHub!

one_liner.value: Helping businesses embed an AI assistant inside their product

hits.name: Salvy
hits.long_description:
Salvy is a mobile carrier for businesses in Brazil. Over 250 companies use Salvy to manage over 5,000 mobile lines, cutting costs by over 50%.
The founders have worked many years together in Brazil's largest fintechs (Nubank and EBANX).

Today, every carrier in Brazil has roughly the same network quality - it isn't a differentiator. If you're an IT manager who needs to deploy 2k lines, you want an integrated and seamless solution. You need to deploy this resource, fast. Salvy provides a software layer that makes deploying and managing mobile lines a fast and efficient process, integrated with HRIS, ERPs, and others.

With our current ACV, if we tackle 10% of mid/large-size companies in Brazil, we get to $100M in ARR. A 1.3% market share of Brazil's B2B mobile telecom would represent a $100M ARR business. 

What we discovered is that IT managers also need this solution for their other resources such as SaaS, devices, and contracts. When delivering those, we get to billions. In four weeks, 32 companies used our AI invoice reader, adding up to 264k ARR opportunities. In Feb, we had 19 companies using our newly launched device management solution.

hits.name: Ragas
hits.long_description:
In a world where knowledge is continually evolving connecting LLMs to external knowledge bases (RAG) is one the most practical and popular applications of LLMs to get up to date information. While creating basic RAG applications is straightforward with frameworks like llama-index and langchain, developing a customized, production-quality RAG system is complex due to the need to fine-tune various elements in the RAG pipeline. Ragas provides tools to objectively assess, monitor, and enhance your RAG application.

Founders Shahul and Jithin, with over half a decade of experience in AI and open-source, started building Ragas five months ago. Our library is now a go-to for users, with over 1M responses evaluated monthly using Ragas. Looking ahead, we anticipate a surge in RAG applications built upon foundational models, and our aim is to significantly improve their efficiency and effectiveness.
hits.one_liner: Open-source evaluation and testing framework for LLM applications.

hits.name: Markprompt
hits.long_description:
Close customer support tickets faster with AI.

We’re building AI infrastructure to power customer support at scale. With Markprompt, companies can automate customer support, scale without increasing headcount, and deliver exceptional user experiences.
 
Scaling customer support with headcount is expensive, with human resources accounting for 90%+ of customer support expenses. On top of that, customer support agents often burn out leading to turnover and reduced quality. As companies grow, so does their expert knowledge, which is hard to access at scale and makes keeping employees up-to-date nearly impossible.

Markprompt addresses the root of the information access problem by indexing all available knowledge within a company, setting the foundation for a robust system of record to feed the AI. Built from the ground up with an API-first approach, Markprompt provides SDKs (such as React hooks and components) and no-code tools to enable integrations at all touchpoints in the customer journey.
hits.one_liner: AI for customer support

hits.name: Guide Labs
hits.long_description:
At Guide labs, we build interpretable foundation models that can explain their reasoning, and tools to align, steer, and debug these models. We provide access to these models via an API and also allow our users to customize them by fine-tuning on their own data. We've developed the first interpretable large language model, and diffusion model. Over the past 6 years, our team has built and deployed interpretable models at Meta, Google, and Genentech. 

Our models provide explanations that indicates:  1) provide human-understandable explanations, for each output token, 2) which parts of the input (prompt) is most important for each part of the generated output, and 3) which inputs, in the training data, directly led to the model's generated output. Because our models can explain their outputs, they are easier to align, debug, and steer.
hits.one_liner: Interpretable foundation models that are easy to align

Run ML models across your data. Categorize, extract, summarize, translate, and more.

hits.name: Glimmer
hits.long_description:
Glimmer is a new way to search massive PDFs using AI.

If you've ever dealt with massive PDFs (i.e. over 1,000 pages), you know how broken search can be. You have no choice but to use “Cmd-F” and manually sift through thousands of search results to find specific information. Professionals in construction, law, finance, and healthcare spend hours doing this every day.


Glimmer makes searching these large documents 10x easier. 


When you upload a PDF, Glimmer uses AI to intelligently index your documents. You can then search your PDF in natural language and get answers with verifiable page sources.


You can get started with Glimmer for free with any kind of PDF at withglimmer.com.

hits.name: Celest
hits.long_description:
Celest is a backend-as-a-service for Flutter and Dart developers. It empowers Flutter developers with the tools and capabilities they need to become full-stack developers. We are introducing "Cloud Widgets", a set of primitives which enable you to declaratively define every piece of your backend and infrastructure in Dart.

As the role of the front-end developer evolves towards full-stack proficiency, we recognize that existing tools have fallen short for those specializing in Flutter. Using the programming language and patterns Flutter developers already know from building their frontend, Celest enables developers to build and connect their apps to their backend with no additional tooling.

We enable Flutter developers to concentrate on building features and delivering value to their customers rather than learning additional domains and fragmenting themselves across disparate toolchains.
hits.one_liner: Turning every Flutter developer into a full-stack developer

hits.name: Selera Medical
hits.long_description: Heart failure impacts millions worldwide and is associated with poor quality of life and high mortality rates. Because the heart cannot pump efficiently, fluids buildup around the body. Fluid overload is the main driver behind patient symptoms (shortness of breath, fatigue, chest pain, etc.) and hospitalizations. Our minimally invasive device leverages the body's innate fluid management system to offload trapped fluid and prevent subsequent rounds of buildup. The one-time procedure has sustained effect -- keeping patients healthier, happier, and out of the hospital.
hits.one_liner: Minimally invasive device for chronic heart failure

hits.name: Yoneda Labs
hits.long_description:
Yoneda Labs provides software to help chemists optimise reactions. When chemists make a drug or a material, we help them figure out the best reaction parameters such as temperature, concentration and catalyst.

When Jan was working at chemical labs, he experienced the struggle of spending weeks guessing reaction conditions. We then started experimenting with ML to speed up the process.

Now, as a team of three friends from the University of Cambridge, we’ve spent the last month combining our domain expertise in Computer Science, Machine Learning and Chemistry to develop state of the art models for reaction optimisation.

Although ML is becoming well established in other fields, current chemical models generalise poorly and require lots of programming experience. We make our models easily accessible to chemists in the lab.

Finding the right conditions quickly allows pharmaceutical companies to test more drugs, and finding better optima makes manufacturing process cheaper and more environmentally friendly.
hits.one_liner: Optimising Chemical Reactions

hits.name: Trellis
hits.long_description:
Trellis converts your unstructured data into SQL-compliant tables with a schema you define in natural language. With Trellis, you can now run SQL queries on complex data sources like financial documents, contracts, and emails. Our AI engine guarantees accurate schema and results.

Leading enterprises use Trellis to:

1. Unlock hidden revenue in their customer data (e.g., Underwriting teams use Trellis to extract key features from transaction data and build better risk models.)
2. Supercharge RAG applications by enabling end-users to ask analytical questions not possible before with traditional Vector DB (e.g., what are the top three features that users are requesting)
3. Enrich their data warehouse with business-critical information (e.g., Retrieving detailed pricing and quantity information of products sold on competitor websites)
hits.one_liner: LLM-powered Snowflake for unstructured data

hits.name: BondCenter
hits.long_description:
Surety bonds are financial guarantees that businesses must purchase to comply with government regulations. For example, all contractors must have a surety bond to bid and work on federal construction projects. It is a $8b opportunity in the US. 

BondCenter is building the surety bond platform for the 21st century. Businesses can apply for bonds and receive affordable quotes online in minutes. We offer the fastest and simplest online experience for getting surety bonds.

Bonds are also purchased through insurance brokers, who receive bond requests but don’t have the expertise to handle them. BondCenter partners with insurance brokers to provide them with a custom-branded surety bond purchase portal that they can share with customers. We then handle everything from bond issuance to renewal, making bonds profitable for insurance agents.
hits.one_liner: The Modern Surety Bond Platform

hits.name: Argon AI, Inc.
hits.long_description:
Argon AI is a platform where biopharma and life sciences professionals can execute complex and data driven workflows using natural language. We help professionals get thorough answers to questions about clinical trials, existing treatments, healthcare landscape, and the competitive market in minutes rather than months. 

Prior to starting Argon, Samy was responsible for Flatiron Health’s (Roche) first data analytics project which eventually led to the start of the Flatiron Services business unit. There, he saw first-hand the heavily manual process that biopharma companies struggle through to get the insights they need to drive forward their drug development programs. He also helped close over $6M+ in ARR and is an expert in enterprise pharma sales.

Cyrus and Frances are building the software to tackle the insights generation problem using recent breakthroughs in AI. Frances previously studied geophysics at Stanford and has built scalable and secure ML / AI solutions at multiple high-growth startups including Cloudflare and OneSignal. Cyrus previously led engineering teams and built 0 to 1 across pre-seed and unicorn startups, and managed mission-critical trade generation systems at Bridgewater.

Breakthroughs in AI present an opportunity to reinvent biopharma and life science workflows to reduce the time and cost of bringing treatments to patients where delays in bringing a drug to market can cost a pharma company $3M / day.

hits.name: malibou
hits.long_description:
malibou is a web application helping French SMBs to manage employees, run payroll and track compliance in a single app.

When processing payroll in France, you either have the choice between an accountant with good advice but no way to connect an HRIS with him, or a good HRIS that does not include payroll services. It was time for a change, to finally bring payroll and HR at the same place. 

Due to increasing competition in the space, French payroll engines have just opened their APIs. This allows us to offer a unified payroll and HR solution, which wasn't possible before.

malibou was launched 4 months ago and helps more than 40 companies to manage and pay hundreds of employees.
hits.one_liner: the first all-in-one payroll and HR software for French SMBs

hits.name: Adagy Robotics
hits.long_description:
Adagy is a remote intervention service that rescues robots when they fail. For example, when a tractor robot gets lost in a field, instead of calling the farmer for help, it can now call Adagy, whose operators will take control of the robot and remotely drive it back to safety. 

We’re starting with trained human operators assisted by generative AI, and as we collect more data, our model will learn to handle more of the edge cases. 

We want to see a world with more robots, so we’re addressing the biggest problem in robot deployment: reliability.

hits.name: Nuanced, Inc.
hits.long_description:
Nuanced detects AI-generated images. We help companies like dating apps, news sites, and ad platforms to distinguish between AI-generated and human-authored content. 

With AI-generated content on the rise, many contexts require differentiating it from human-authored materials to ensure authenticity and trust in the digital world. Making this distinction is especially crucial when there are possible implications for misinformation, spam, abuse, or cybercrime. Existing technologies are ill-equipped to do so, costing an annual $78 billion spent on handling deepfakes. 

Our API allows integrators to use AI to get ahead of AI easily, without having to spin up their own infrastructure. We train custom models in a zero PII environment, removing the risk of compromising user privacy. 

Ayman and Dylan met as undergraduate engineering students at the University of Waterloo. Each cofounder has over a decade of engineering and research experience.

Ayman most recently spent 7 years at GitHub, contributing to several areas of the product, including building and scaling abuse mitigation infrastructure for over 100 million users. While at GitHub, she saw first-hand how AI-driven threats were evolving, including witnessing established methods fail to detect user profiles that were generated by ChatGPT. Ayman’s experience at GitHub and her dissertation research in machine learning-based cloud platform security at the University of Oxford drove her to found Nuanced.

Dylan has over a decade of machine learning experience spanning industry and academia, culminating in a notable 6-year tenure as an Applied AI Scientist at Amazon.

They both quickly agreed that online content creation and consumption were rapidly changing and wanted to build something to help online platforms address evolving authenticity concerns. This is why Nuanced provides a user-friendly API that helps restore the authenticity and trust of services.
hits.one_liner: We detect AI-generated images to verify authenticity

20% of the population suffer with their mental health each year. Today, you need to wait several months to get a therapy appointment and pay more than $100 per session. With Sonia, you receive support directly from your bed when your crisis kicks in at 2am.

Relari helps AI teams simulate, test, and validate complex AI applications throughout the development lifecycle.

We are the company behind continuous-eval, an open-source modular evaluation framework with metrics covering text generation, code generation, retrieval, classification, agents, and other LLM use cases. Our cloud platform generates custom synthetic data and simulates user behavior to stress test and harden GenAI applications.
hits.one_liner: Testing and Simulation Stack for GenAI Systems

hits.name: DryMerge
hits.long_description: We're making software to let people automate work with plain English. Say you want a reminder whenever a coworker emails you. Instead of using prebuilt blocks or writing code, just tell DryMerge "Whenever John sends me an email, shoot me a slack message reminding me to respond" and watch it happen.

hits.name: NavierAI
hits.long_description:
Navier AI is making CFD 1000x faster with their ML-based solver.


Physics simulations, such as Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), are essential across many industries ranging from the design and analysis of aircraft, to weather prediction, to the development of medical devices. Today’s simulation tools use explicit numerical solvers for physical equations, such as the Naiver-Stokes equations. These solvers are complex to setup and can take ages to produce results.


Navier AI is building 1000x faster simulations using physics-ML solvers. Navier AI's fast CFD platform will enable engineers to quickly explore design spaces and perform analysis-in-the-loop design optimization. They are lowering the barrier to entry for aerospace and mechanical engineers to create high performance designs.
hits.one_liner: Real-Time CFD Simulations

hits.name: AgentHub
hits.long_description:
AgentHub is a platform for automating repetitive and complex workflows end-to-end with AI. 

Builders drag, drop, and connect modular components onto a canvas to build powerful automations.

We provide the tools and the infrastructure to operate at 10x the speed of writing, testing, and productionizing code so you can focus on the problem at hand.

hits.name: Driver AI
hits.long_description:
Driver AI is a tool that explains millions of lines of code in minutes instead of months. When you need to do technical discovery, you can use Driver AI’s interactive documentation to understand complex codebases at a fraction of the time and cost.

Even better, Driver AI automatically stays in sync as the business evolves, so the technical discovery process only gets faster over time. 

Co-founders Daniel and Adam are engineers who have been building companies and software at the intersection of signal processing and machine learning for over a decade. Our third co-founder, Jimmy, has led finance and operations for some of the most successful technology companies in the world, from large global leaders to high-growth start-ups.

After selling his last company, Adam led various software efforts in innovation at Nike. But he kept encountering the same problem: Nothing new could be built without a long and very expensive tech discovery process. It was maddening. He soon discovered this problem was everywhere—from enterprise IT to embedded software development teams—and, with Jimmy and Daniel, built Driver AI to fix it. 

The eagerness of early customers to engage with us across a wide range of industries has been unlike any idea we have worked on before. One SVP at a leading Global Semiconductor Company recently called Driver AI “a paradigm shift for managing our complex software delivery pipeline.”
hits.one_liner: Understand millions of lines of code in minutes.

hits.name: Lantern
hits.long_description:
Lantern is the easiest way to build AI applications using Postgres.

We started Lantern because we believe AI is going to impact every single enterprise in every single industry. We want to allow every company to tap into their unstructured data to build better applications.

With Lantern Cloud, developers have access to everything they need to build an AI application: embedding generation, vector search, efficient indexing, on top of the database they already know, Postgres.

Check out our code on Github: https://github.com/lanterndata/lantern
hits.one_liner: PostgreSQL vector database extension to build AI applications

hits.name: Danswer
hits.long_description:
Danswer is the AI assistant that connects to all your company tools and docs and makes finding any piece of information a breeze. Think ChatGPT, but with access to all your companies documents (only the ones you have access to, of course :P). Or, if you know Glean, you can think about it like an open-source Glean. 

Concerned about your data? Don't worry we're fully open source (MIT license) and built to be self-hosted. You can setup Danswer in your VPC in less than 30 minutes - no packets ever have to leave your cloud.

Check us out on Github: https://github.com/danswer-ai/danswer!
hits.one_liner: Open Source Unified Search across Company Tools

hits.name: Yenmo
hits.long_description:
Yenmo offers a better way to access cash for India’s 60 million investors who either resort to personal loans at over 18% interest or have to liquidate their investments when in need of money. With Yenmo, they can pledge their investments digitally and instantly get a loan at a fixed 10.5% interest rate.

Our Insight - In India, over 30% of personal loan borrowers have active investments and are paying double the interest rate they qualify for with us.
hits.one_liner: Instant loan against mutual funds and stocks for Indians
